text.__SUMMARY__:
Camposcia retusa, known commonly as the spider decorator crab, is a species of marine crustacea in the family Inachidae.
The spider decorator crab  is widespread throughout the tropical waters of the Indo-West Pacific area, including the Red Sea.This crab has a shell size of 3 cm and with the legs it can reach 10 cm.
